mapper.select: select oper_id, title, business_type, method, request_method, oper_name, oper_url, oper_ip, status, errorMsg, operTime from oper_log where oper_id = #{operId}
mapper.insert: insert into oper_log(title, business_type, method, request_method, oper_name, oper_url, oper_ip, status, errorMsg, operTime) values (#{title}, #{businessType}, #{method}, #{requestMethod}, #{operName}, #{operUrl}, #{operIp}, #{status}, #{errormsg}, #{opertime})

insert into oper_log(title, business_type, method, request_method, oper_name, oper_url, oper_ip, status, errorMsg, operTime) values
(#{entity.title}, #{entity.businessType}, #{entity.method}, #{entity.requestMethod}, #{entity.operName}, #{entity.operUrl}, #{entity.operIp}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.errormsg}, #{entity.opertime})

insert into oper_log(title, business_type, method, request_method, oper_name, oper_url, oper_ip, status, errorMsg, operTime) values
(#{entity.title}, #{entity.businessType}, #{entity.method}, #{entity.requestMethod}, #{entity.operName}, #{entity.operUrl}, #{entity.operIp}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.errormsg}, #{entity.opertime})
on duplicate key update title = values(title), business_type = values(business_type), method = values(method), request_method = values(request_method), oper_name = values(oper_name), oper_url = values(oper_url), oper_ip = values(oper_ip), status = values(status), errorMsg = values(errorMsg), operTime = values(operTime)
mapper.update:
update oper_log
title = #{title},
business_type = #{businessType},
method = #{method},
request_method = #{requestMethod},
oper_name = #{operName},
oper_url = #{operUrl},
oper_ip = #{operIp},
status = #{status},
errorMsg = #{errormsg},
operTime = #{opertime},
where oper_id = #{operId}
